# Nirvana Guild Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack gothic-themed guild website with Next.js frontend and Express backend.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js (App Router), Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Socket.io
- Authentication: JWT
- Design: Gothic, dark fantasy, animated

## Project Structure Completed
✓ Frontend and backend folders created
✓ All core pages and components implemented
✓ Real-time chat with Socket.io
✓ Authentication system with JWT
✓ Theme system (dark/light mode)
